entry.title: RT Mustafa Al-Bassam: To my knowledge, with almost 1000 participants, this is the largest incentivized testnet in blockchain history. One of the core ...
entry.summary:
RT Mustafa Al-Bassam To my knowledge, with almost 1000 participants, this is the largest incentivized testnet in blockchain history. One of the core values of Celestia is that users should be first-class citizens of the network. That's why this testnet will have 700+ data sampling light nodes. https://twitter.com/CelestiaOrg/status/1633135451640061952
Celestia: Today officially marks the beginning of the Blockspace Race, Celestia’s incentivized testnet program 🏁 Validators have now entered into phase 1: liftoff. https://t.co/iiAsGLWawo
